Tantrum keeps firing, but notices a silluete pass over him. He looks up and
sees a huge monster fly towards Divebomb, "Yo Bomber, you need some help up
there?" he asks through snorts, not relenting on his attack.

OOC: Okay, now I'm really going to bed now (damn addictive game):P
